lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Dagen) "If this is an undead giant, it's already dead."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give me 10 hours. I'll get it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They do bite! They do bite!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another one of the rangers accompanies, just to make sure that they have a team heading out that direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They bite just like you, huh, Sprinkle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Sprinkle currently has a bunch of ice caked in the fur and is sitting there like (shivering).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Put me in the bag, too!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll put him down my jacket so he's covered up more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, curls up to warm inside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (as Sprinkle) "Make it end!" (laughter) (as Sprinkle) "I've lived too long!" (laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What would you like to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll probably heal Jester because you've got, like, what? 12 or 14?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got a few, I've-- I'm a little, I'm a little messed up right now, but I'm fine!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many hit points do you have?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've cleared the door, we could-- No one knows this place exists as far as we know, we could just take a moment here, yeah? Catch your breath?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's get a few feet inside maybe and--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I'm just thinking of, just--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just being ready, just in case.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So yeah, maybe not going inside is the way to go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How big is the entrance that we came in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's it's about two feet wide and about four, four and a half feet tall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, that's as far as anyone's gone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We do have the benefit of you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you all were stepping towards it when you were attacked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought this was like inside the cave.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you're talking like White Rabbit rabbit hole? This thing is shrinking down and in this passage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can't see past the opening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just the dark entrance, the crack in the ice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At least if we go inside, anyone that-- I mean, they're not going to scry on us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's just-- There's that little pocket where we can hide and somebody can just keep-- I'll keep an eye out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Across the wall to see if anyone's going to come down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So are you taking a short rest? And you're taking it on the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I think if anyone's going to surprise us it's because they have eyes, physical eyes, on us now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So where are you taking your short rest?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're, of course, wiping snow for these--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to take a second to clear out--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should we check them out at all?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: See what the blue thing is?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, you search a body, I'll search a body.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vibrate the ground a little bit to just get all the snow to even out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a cantrip, so it's not extremely powerful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not going to get rid of giant tracks, if that's what you're trying to do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just thinning everything out a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, not much of use on them, unfortunately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like they didn't have anything to heal themselves with originally.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You going to be okay? You need any--? Oh, you can just use--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just going to use up some of my hit dice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I need a short rest for some stuff anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essek is going to take a short rest as well to regain a spell slot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That frog miniature is too fucking cute.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If there was any large area that was heavily disturbed, I'll use Create Water to create a 30-foot cube of just snow, fresh snow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can refill that and cover them with one casting for each of them, if you'd like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And then I'll take the short rest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anything-- We see anything coming our way while--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You spend a good portion of the time for your friends to rest up, heal, catch their breath, prepare themselves for delving into what you assume to be a lightless interior, an endless maze of whatever this city might've been and as you glance out past the edge of the snow, as the ridge begins to slightly ascend into the space where you are, you see a cute little snow bunny, leaping from space to space.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I can't hit it with Sacred Flame from here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you'd have to get closer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to keep an eye on that bunny.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't trust that damn thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bunny, eventually, you lose sight of, as it is now within a patch of deep snow and is no longer visible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anyone sees a bunny, just shoot on sight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's Percy when you need him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Before my short rest, I was using--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Short rest, I get everything back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She got 35 points back along with her hit dice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I used all of my hit dice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're stomping to get the circulation back in your feet and wriggling your fingers as much as possible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It really wasn't, like, painful cold, you know what I mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We thought you were going to be diamond dust.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could see through the ice that was freezing me so I could see that the things were attacking me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was it like when you were just doing, just ass-over-kettle when you were in the air?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, it was just a lot of spinny and then all of a sudden I saw Fjord.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what's at the end of the tunnel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the Fjord at the end of the tunnel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "The Ford at the end of the tunnel."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When you die, there's always a Ford there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the marching order of entry?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need someone who can see in the dark.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I really want to go in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You should probably have someone checking--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'll go up there, sure--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When we were in the Happy Fun Ball we did great with traps, I'm an old pro.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, go for it, you're fine!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, then I'll go next.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do think you should go up at the front and look for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so we have Fjord.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are volunteering Veth for us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need some light or else all of my checks will be at disadvantage, I think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pop my staff to make a little light as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And keep looking over my shoulder as I go.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to keep my sword out and guide with my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does give you a bit of a glow in the radius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Mighty Nein, one by one, you've squeezed into the small entryway to these ruins.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you take the same order of people?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll stay close to the front.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How little is the crawl space?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to be a tough fit for probably Fjord and Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as long as you get down and crawl, you'll probably make it through without issue, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to put on some glasses and sneakle in first, or?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, or you can cast a bubble of light or something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Glasses may be the way to go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Uh, sure, I'll wear the glasses and I'll go first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an investigation check for me, if you don't mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you have the darkvision goggles on, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the radius on those goggles?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seems like 60, yeah, darkvision 60 feet, something like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And across the way, it just comes to this broken wall of scattered stone and slate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far away is the other wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Other wall is about 15, 20 feet from you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your investigation check, what you do find are signs of long-abandoned climbing gear as well as two pitons, as they're called--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you can see a single ice-coated rope that angles--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On your side, that descends into the darkness below.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. And you guys are with me, right? You didn't send me by myself, or?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You were a little ahead of us, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You turn around to say this and there's nobody there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it stone? Is it ice? Stone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just seeing broken and refrozen earth and rock.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, if there's any loose rock around, not big, just like, you know, size of a silver dollar--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a couple of small that are wedged into the sides of the small way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going try to chip one off or pull one off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a dexterity check for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a skill che-- or an ability check, so you can't roll lower than a 10.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, and I'll pop it over the side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who knows what's holding all of this jumble of barely balanced stone together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you pluck it, it's a brief moment as you pull it and you go, "Oh, that could have been bad."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you chuck it off the side?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a bunch of black symbiotes at the bottom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you want to come or should I come back? You can reply to this message.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, okay, there's nothing dangerous that is going to bite me in there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I'm going to start to crawl up slowly with two globules lighting my way 'til I reach her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I tell everyone what I'm doing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there a standing platform at the end of the little crawl space?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it a Die Hard elevator shaft and the AC joint and then you're just down or can you kind of stand up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's a shaft and then it just drops into darkness.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And you're in the crawl space?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it looks like it opens a little bit, but whatever impact caused this to collapse beneath is what's left there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's very tight and it's very precarious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But there are signs of previous climbing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, then maybe I should go back and we can talk about this in a bigger space? I don't know, because otherwise it's going to be like--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He can fly, a flyer would be good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, we need to figure this out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the only way forward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If there are people to be--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I tossed something down, I didn't hear anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you think that tentacles or something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What the fuck is happening? What now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Globule it down, there's nobody down there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to throw a little pebble from my pouch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to throw another pebble? I did this, I did the pebble trick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did it already, you're just--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to send three of them sort of spiraling around each other in a circle, a hundred feet down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, what's the radius in the light there for each glob?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They will go 40 feet away from each other in a wide circle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see some scroll work on it, but most of it's still buried in the rock and ice in the side of the wall, partway down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there any sort of outcrop or ledge where that door is that we could stand on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a rope that goes all the way--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Door-- goes past the door into the darkness?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Past-- yeah, past the door, into darkness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Darkness and a singular frost coated rope, dangling and vanishing into the abyss below.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Mage Hand pushes, moves across, you can see bits of frost fall and a bit of small pebble.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, it's not just a fake out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And remind us, how tight is the space where Veth and I are now at the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys are-- about two feet across.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could not fit Veth with probably Yasha or Fjord.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then Mage Hand will come back and just go--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are on the verge of being stuck, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, Veth, you scoot your way back to the rest of the group and you see, as she emerges from--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was high level, high level.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Who was the next in the lineup?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so what do we do? I guess we were-- this is it, right? There's no other tunnels or anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So there's a doorway some of the way down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like an open or is there a-- (clicking)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I think it's just a piece of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unattached to any doorframe, doorway, or opening to anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just a door partially sticking out of the wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That door knows what it did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. That door is a warning to us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Nicodranas, huh? Cool, cool, cool, cool, cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vox Machina got fucking fed up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And it opens up at the bottom approximately how deep?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, where it widens out from the look of the globule?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It widens out at about the 85 foot depth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then 15 feet past, the light ends before you get there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is bringing back some dreams right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It feels vaguely reminiscent of when, the last time we were-- as we descended down into the cavern that had the trees that you didn't like.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we going to say anything to these rangers out here? We need to give them direction to let them know that they need to let the Tomb Takers go by and not interfere with them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But then are they going to blow the door?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, they're going to use the walkie-talkies that Essek gave to let us know if somebody is coming.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then are they going to blow the door after they go in?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But if they're going to keep going, it might be nicer to have them, I don't know, get hit by an intuit charge as they're climbing down a tunnel that goes into darkness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or if they can go over--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did we discuss though, I'm talking out of character here, just our memories, that the intuits are psychic damage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the Tomb Takers are-- that's not a big deal for them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can confirm Lucien, but even if we take out the rest of the Tomb Takers--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could also put a fluffernutter in this little crawl space tunnel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We would also need another way out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could also put the symbol, the spell that I have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The spell is I can leave a glyph somewhere where they won't see it and it'll trigger when they pass by it or when they touch it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because if it takes them out for a minute--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to take advantage of that minute.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And if you can stun, won't we want to take advantage of that one minute where they can't move, so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It does psychic damage and stuns them, four of them fall and fall past your glyph on the way down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Unless they're all immune to psychic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So someone that can fly should go down and at least see what the hell that darkness actually is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And just, not to keep pushing this, but we-- hang on, speaking as Marisha for a second, we were talking about--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go back the other way."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just throwing that out there, I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we had a discussion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we can always tell them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know if you directly relayed that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That would have to be one of your things, right? That would have to be a fluffernutter, unless the rangers have--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And do we know for sure they're not down there already?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We saw snow, you saw snow when you peeped at them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There was a moment before, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, he said it was a dark cloud.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was foggy and then a flash of red and then I was like, ugh, no, that didn't work.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The other thing is, would they see your glyph if they saw the dome and if they can see your door?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 'Cause I had one for a while and then in the bag we ganged from the Tomb Takers that had three or two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have to look at my notes again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they seem to be collecting them as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we set as many as we can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, before we decide where we're ambushing them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It feels like we need to explore a bit more.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, we need to know the terrain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Somebody that can walk on walls or can fly, or--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can walk on walls if you want me to?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For a good amount of time--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd prefer a flyer, just so they don't have to touch--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can fly, but I'm also--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But Essek can do it effortlessly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he just floated down an entire cliff side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can Spider Climb for an hour.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You won't slip or fall or anything?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, but I could go with Essek, or with someone else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can glide down, but I do not have the ability to fly prepared for the day."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, like you couldn't come back up?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't want you to go alone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can Spider Climb, too, if I'm a spider and you can ride.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could turn into ice spiders.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would you be able to carry us down also, as an ice spider?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I could probably spend half of my time as a spider to do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I mean we could just Feather Fall us down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But we don't want to just go down the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We spend the first half of that or less, hopefully, taking a look and then if it's okay, then-- (skittering)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll probably know, but just make some noise if it's bad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't you have a climb with your monk shit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can fall very gracefully and I can wall climb.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think it's more of jutting up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you could slow fall down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you'd fall, and didn't you say there were--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I know I just said I will take advantage to jump off of any cliff--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You met a cliff that's too scary.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I could carry you down, as well as Yasha, too, if you like.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You mean like ride a spider?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're just risking you, don't risk everybody.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I'm bringing Yasha with me, because I'm weak as a spider and as a human.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, I absolutely can go with you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And if I need to I can get a--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ooh, look at you! You look so tasty, Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, could you roll a d20 for me, please?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have to roll one or a 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to cast Spider Climb on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll a d20 yourself, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your spell seems to imbue you with the spider climbing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This first step's gonna be a doozy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll start walking down the side of the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I use two of my eight legs like a safety belt for Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Om nom nom! Ooh, you're so tasty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to hang off, just looking over the side of the cliff to see.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're the only one in the tunnel now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll be in the tunnel, that way I can cast heal, if they're within, you know, 60 feet when they fall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, well, I want to see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you begin to descend, a spider at a rapid speed of what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 'Tis, speed is just 30 for climbing, forever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So the two of you climb at a respective rate making your way down until eventually it broadens out and you are now both standing upon the ceiling of a larger cavern amongst all manner of heavy ice icicles, massive, 12-foot long, pointed icicles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It widens out and then there's a forest of icicles that are all dripping off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We still don't see the ground?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it opened into a chamber.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. You don't have any light sources currently below you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you are Mission Impossible-ing from the bottom of a large spider, like--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Even though I've got Spider Climb, if I pick an icicle that drops, I'm still fucked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It'll just stick me to the ice, but the ice could fall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have the goggles though, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, for a range of 60 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You can just barely see the peripheral of your vision as you get down there and you have 60 foot darkvision as well?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know I have darkvision, I'm pretty sure, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So about 50 feet below you, there is a bottom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess we'll go across the ceiling to see if it ever meets or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like you both to make a athletics check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Both of you just carefully make your way over to the edge--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you bring light with you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can see as a spider.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Darkvision and blind sense for 10 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what you see ahead of you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know what that means.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm seeing a hundred Yashas, broken in all the little eyes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Pull a little webbing out if you understand me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we'll just walk-- How long's it been? It's 10 minutes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, no, with the careful crawling across the ceiling, I'd say closer to 10, probably, just slowly bringing your way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you, with the spider thing as well.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And we're on the ground at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're on the ground at this point, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, should we tell everybody to come down?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start playing with Veth's hair as a spider.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get the fricken-- All right, it's nice, it's nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The total climb from where they are, where our friends are to here, is what? More than 200 feet at this point, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say it's about close to 190 feet, considering the angle across the ceiling to the base of the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I can't actually send them a message anymore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope. I mean, they're too far, so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope. And even if we did, we only have one stone and it can talk to the people outside.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can always just climb back up and tell--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, sometimes, I've realized that, when I talk to somebody, they--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can only do that to me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, let me walk over here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yasha has no idea how communication devices work.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (quietly) Uh, Veth can you hear me?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm coming back over to you in three, two, one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then I make it look like we were farther away.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should we investigate this place, then, or should we wait?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the only place of interest around, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aside from the single rope that's still in the center of the room that dangles down near where that stone bench was and a lot of the wreckage.

lines.name: SAM, ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's go check out this place.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Giant spider is actually going to hang back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: By the base of the wall.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, should Caleb go get everybody?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, we can't tell them what's going on.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All of a sudden he's going to come back there, and then the two of us are gone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could stay down here, I could climb halfway up and tell everyone what's going on.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel like Beau is going to get worried and be like, "Oh, what happened?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. We'll just check this out.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then we'll go get them.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah. We'll just make sure--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is the door open? Is there a door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a splintered door that is off the hinges and just scattered along the side of an open arch that leads into this room about 25, 30 feet from you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make a constitution saving throw for me, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, sure, that's normal at an empty space.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I make one, too? No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you moving with him? Then yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Honey, I Shrunk the Kids ant voice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You both take nine points of cold damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, cause it's cold down there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your bones seize up, you chatter in your jaw, and you don't understand why.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was it just when we walked towards the building?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You got maybe 10 feet. It's 20 feet from you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take another step towards it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah, of course you will.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well then, how about I use that Mage Hand to sort of touch the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, it's open, and you touch the door and some of the wood, (crumbling) falls onto the ground.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think it's fine. I think we should go in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll walk towards the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see there's a little bit of a path that can almost climb up to where the second floor was, and a little bit of where the upper platform still remains, if it still is load bearing, but yeah, just a lot of rubble in here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Don't you want to go up and look at the second floor? The thing is, I'm very big, so-- and you're small.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that-- what do you mean?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I just feel like we don't know if it's going to collapse or something with my weight, if you would go up there, or I mean, if I go up there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to need such an expensive regeneration, aren't we?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know, do you want to go up there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm volunteering you, but maybe you don't want to go.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You have a family to get back to, so we need to--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is-- there's nothing in here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah, should we both go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a stairway leading up, if I sort of peer in there or do we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see stairs, but a lot of the fallen rubble of the precarious interior is possibly climbable to get to the--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's like how the rubble fell simply for us to go up there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't have to convince me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, this is a bit of a climbing challenge, so I'd like you both to make an athletics check to find your way up through the broken interior.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you gathered some of the rubble on the immediate outskirts of this structure may have been higher floors that were just laid waste as they tumbled.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to look around, see if we can find any--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to try and rummage around, you can make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will look for traps first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a very dangerous place.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, now I'll look for good things.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm tall, it's cramped in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, I need you both make constitution saving throws again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, so this is a timed--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get that shit, get that shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you both take 11 points of cold damage, but your investigation check reveals that around where this robe is in this space, there's a fuzzy texture along it, like along the wall, like a bit of an odd carpet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like a darker coloration than a lot of the nearby stone, and as you reached in, and the temperature gets bitingly cold again once more, you swear you see some of it shift, and expand in reaction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, we got to get out of here, we got to get out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, as because you were both rummaging, I need you both make a dexterity check in this precarious place.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Remember that last time we were down here, and there was a thing up in the cavern that we managed not to disturb, but it was kind of fuzzy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you do notice this odd presence.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should leave. We should leave here because I think that's alive.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That thing that's moving, the fur?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, the fur that's moving is probably--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if this silk robe on this half-skeleton body is the thing that we need to win?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is the clue, this is the clue to Aeor--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is the literal clue. What if it is?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if I just move some of the stone for you to get the robe? What if we just try to like-- have you ever seen those things, those people--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Those people, you know, that like-- they, with a tablecloth--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do they do? They're like magic people? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) Yasha, what are you doing? You're now finding yourself alone, freezing in the upper levels of this abandoned, partially collapsed tower.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to sniff to see if it's a familiar smell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, okay, make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is how we lose Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if I just do like a quick-- does it look like-- okay, I just have a really quick question.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does it-- so does it look like-- does it look like the robe is like really-- like it would be a lot of work to pull it out? (cackling laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not deeply buried, from what you can tell, but who knows, everything here is pretty tightly packed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to Bill Murray this, you know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to fucking Bill Murray it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, roll a strength check for me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yasha done got into some Natty Light.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is so stupid, this is so stupid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're doing it, you're doing it. You're already doing it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is so stupid, what if I roll bad?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're super strong. You're going to be fine!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know you want to do it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I do want to do it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to touch the button.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to roll a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But not me downstairs or yes me?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I thought it was a one, though, but it's a seven, so 15.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because I have-- I'm not holding out my sword, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you take eight points of cold damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It comes out, whoosh! (crumbling) Some of the rocks come and settle.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to-- yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, ooh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I dead, am I free, or am I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also have to make a dexterity saving throw, but you have advantage on it, because you are in the lower floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, grabbing the robe, are running, running down, as you look up, Veth, and you see behind Yasha-- (crashing) You both go charging--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I got the robe! I got the robe!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Boof, all this dust comes billowing out of the collapse, and immediately fills the chamber with this opaque atmosphere around you, as you (coughs) cough and cough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys hear this heavy echo of a collapsing loud boom after boom.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no, get the diamonds ready.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we, should we go down?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can turn into a spider!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your friends went down into a pit of despair, and you heard an explosion sound.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to turn into a spider.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have no idea what's going on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can fly one of us down there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so I'll turn into a spider and carry Beau, because she's lighter.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can carry two in theory, can't you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, but yes, Essek can float.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But yes, I can also carry a second with me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I'll go with Fjord, then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (chittering) I can do it, I can do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he's just keeping it loose, but in case anything gets weird, he's just keeping it nearby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So while you guys are descending rapidly, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laid back accent) What are you doing? (laughter) What just happened in there? What'd you do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Or what, the tower, whatever it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does anyone-- is anyone looking at us, or is any creatures?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, did you say it was pink? Or am I making that up about the robe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like, you managed to pull it through--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it got ruined in the process.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What was breathing on the wall just above them?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It was just someone's house robe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's in a bunch of rubble now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Silk can last a long time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It wouldn't last like that. This is magic for sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's for sure. It's this robe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is the key to unlocking the mystical origin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right? All right, so (doosh) sword glowing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a secondary spider emerges and curls underneath, and begins carefully-- If you wouldn't mind making an athletics check for the spider form to climb down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a ruined courtyard from a time long forgotten.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Looking back and seeing the spider making its way with Beau and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there anything creeping up on our friends, or at the periphery of that light?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I high-pitched screech to the other spider. (screeches)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You notice as you arrive and the light expands, what you didn't see with just darkvision is the endless glittering of ice across everything--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How far is the distance in the--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 30 feet for light from the sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "(groans) There is-- There is something curious here."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've been feeling a bitter cold sensation since we got down here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Bitter cold, yeah, a movement of some fur, and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This structure just collapsed on its own when we got down here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But we did find this robe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the key to unlocking the Somnovem.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Essek, what were you going to say? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you see him shivering, just floating the air a bit, going, "This is a very odd sensation."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there something here we can't see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) That's my favorite somatic component for a spell right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not sense anything magical other than what you've brought with you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So nothing on the robe, is what you're saying.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Essek, if you are cold, I happen to have a robe on me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is anybody else getting, like, a--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, and what'd you roll perception?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As this is happening, you look beneath this, the glittering diamonds, and amongst the rubble of rock and stone, it's hard to see until you really focus, bones, many bones.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to light the staff--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the patches of brown beneath the ice, you can tell in areas have an odd fuzzy texture to them like a mold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should get out of here. This is not good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we see exits? Any way to get out of this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a whole half of the chamber we can't see, because it's too dark, so--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He says, "There is an archway on the opposite side this way, but--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb spider is going to start going over the arch of the ceiling in that direction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Want to take someone with you, or--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we wanting to leave this room before we use it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You mean, to put traps here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think this is a trap.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It could be one to our advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still don't hate the idea of putting the intuit charges at the top of the tunnel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They won't see it, and they will, in essence, fall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's got to be something with the moss, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need to get out of here soon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So why don't we set the glyphs and go? Although we only get one shot at these bombs, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's stay against the wall for now, and let's see, what--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's almost as high as I can roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's referred to as brown mold, and it is an unnatural fungus that is drawn towards heat and consumes it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does anybody else know what brown mold is?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I know what brown mold is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If anybody else is trained in nature.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm also, probably at this point, into the region that we couldn't see into, because while everyone was talking--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you still on my back, Beau, just talking to everyone? Or did you drop?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think I'm still on your back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there any part of the room that's far enough away from the mold patches, where we can take some purchase for a little bit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a bit of a hopscotch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You probably want to get away from it as soon as possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fair enough. Should I come to you, or am I," he glances up at the spider, "following them?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you guys, do you guys need some help up there? I don't know, make some web if you do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it was just me, I'm out on my own.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the spider does not respond. (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They'll make noise if they need us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know how to make web.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Every spider knows how to make--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what I'm thinking in my head.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, and that's an 18 for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ironically, it's the cold that it leaves behind, in intense ways, can repel it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An extreme, focused, intense lack of heat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like Cone of Cold or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Enough to do cold damage would likely repel it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So cold damage is something that would actually--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If anybody has an ice spell or some sort of cold spell, that's the best way to get this stuff to back off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, are we going into this tunnel?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So the arch is behind us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it looks like a heavy rock shelf is pressed into it, and the archway is bent down, leaving almost a triangular entrance, but it continues onward into a wider hall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's-- we're crossing into Aeor if we go further.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, just beyond that door threshold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They'll be running from these traps and the cold mold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then when they go through the metal doors, we just (rapid shooting).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Psychic hit up there, and then there's something that creates heat right above it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think we should get rid of the mold, I think we should encourage it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The ice will get us through, but if they land into a big heat spot, that's a big problem for them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we going to set these traps, and try and whittle them down, and ambush them later? Or trap and ambush at the same time?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It'd have to be at the same time, because we don't want them to be able to heal and regroup.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So are we going to fight them in this chamber?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could make it pretty damaging along the way, and if they do have to stop and heal, that's not necessarily a bad thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, they do, they're the ones that told us about it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, they've traversed here once before with Vess.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So they know what to expect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather they know what to expect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And then if we decide to make it the Alamo, we can, if we go in further and then nothing is attractive--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But either way, if they are hurt here, and they decide to stop, we could come to this, because the intuit charge will let us know, or we'll hear it, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we can't set up in this room, because we'll get fucked up in the process of just trying to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And if we-- probably should scope it out, but we could wait further into the passage, ready to hit that little opening that they'd be coming through once they're in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The other part is if one of the glyphs goes off, and they're coming down in single file, the first person will trigger it, not the other ones.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So yeah, if they're going down one at a time, then it's not going to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't put it at the top, put it halfway down, so they're doing this, (explosion), fall into intuit charges, (explosion).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if they come down one at a time on the rope, and only one person gets hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could set some more intuits on the bottom, but gravity.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The intuit charge, what triggers it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, there's two ways it goes off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think one is you trigger it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But it's-- "You link your mind to the device, and anytime within the next hour, you may choose to detonate," so that's very limited.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll also remind, I should remind everybody that this won't work on the big bad at all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, but if we can pick away the rest of the Tomb Takers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we're assuming none of them--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, the glyph could potentially work on Lucien.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't necessarily just do mind damage; it can do regular-ass damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think, unless, is he-- let's see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is it, we're just standing in the chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, we should probably move.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get out of here before we finish this talk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Being on Jester, am I near the rope still? The dangling rope, Matt?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have four into it? Four, five?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essek goes-- Thankfully, one of the cantrips he has is Ray of Frost.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it does, you watch as the mold grays and turns to dust where the blade hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that's one way to do it, I suppose.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, let's just make our path and just keep something for them to play with.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So it's a good spot for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It'll still reach everybody all the way up to the top.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we can always backtrack if we need to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will we at least go look through this door to see what's on the other side before we start setting these charges?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because this is our waiting spot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She can fly, you can fly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we had an area that was all frosty and not moldy--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That could be our little bunker.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They can either take it or they found a way past it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And one of the big things we need is distance for the anti-magic cone, distance.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it's not as big as I thought.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And how big is that black light that we have? The magic black light, that poofs--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought you had them, Caduceus, but I could be wrong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The arcane field generator, I think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't see it in my--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys still got that ring of fire protection there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One of us took it, but I didn't write it into my--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't write it down either, but we have them, so--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's go explore the next thing and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's find out a little bit more about what we're dealing with and where they're really going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So my question is, do you need me to carve a path for people?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we better carve a path.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, you come to see, with your light, the partially damaged, still holding, metallic archway into the next hall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, Frozone, that was awesome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The spider peels off of the rock wall onto the now-grayed mold and Caleb is standing in human form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what's the marching order here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, but no, you can still hold on for a piggy, if you want a piggyback ride?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it would just make them, whoever gets it, would be incapacitated for a minute.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does it deal any hit points or just incapacitate?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That doesn't count as a charm or a hold or a?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think so because it's--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A category that we would know from?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a constitution save and it--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A minute of attacking without an anti-magic field is pretty good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, that's the ambush one, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the one we can't set this in a place where we're not going to be able to attack them immediately because it's absolutely worthless for them to bicker amongst themselves or be in pain for a minute if we can't do anything with it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So be right in front of us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is where we do, you know?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far is it from this metal archway, crushed metal archway, to where the rope lands in the chamber?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From where the rope is, it's about 70 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can start dealing damage to the bottom of that rope from this door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, when we first encountered Gelidon that really good tactic that we had, when you were definitely here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When we were all together, sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You guys, your mind was like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, we were very distracted with a white dragon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With your dome. Because you stayed in the dome and pew, pew, pew from--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Those domes, the trick of them, you got to get them up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But if we're ambushing, could we have a dome in this corridor to where?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They can just dispel it immediately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If they have Detect Magic up, it'll be a big shining beacon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, if they're popped by a giant pain trap--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, then we don't need the dome in the first place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As long as we can kill them in a minute, I guess.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a long range on Dispel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This doesn't have to be the room where we pick the fight--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to see more, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We either just set it here and know that it's meant to take out some of them and not be the final, or we can come back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They might spot whatever we set for them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is-- Let's keep going. This is pretty good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. I wish we knew where the fuck they were.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We know that they're not upstairs yet because we would've gotten a radio call.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, worst case scenario, we get the radio call, you two, you haul ass, you fly, you set, book it out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it takes a minute to set--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have to know what we're running into.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But we should keep going, then, if we're not going to do it now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The sack that we got from the Tomb Takers, did it have two or three?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll go ahead and double check the episode but we can do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I feel like it was two because you had one and made it--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Chest of goodies that I didn't write down because I was distracted by sword.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think it is two, but--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: God, I feel like I would've--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, now this entrance way can offer two people at a time, shoulder to shoulder.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Ray of Frost, is the mold traveling past cavern into metal corridor or?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a little bit, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who else? Is anyone going to be aside Essek? Or is Essek just going to be holding the line?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How about some muscle for our friend?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go with Essek and I'll have the sword out so there's light at the front.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll go back there, behind them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you still using them or you good?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we can share like headphones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you were approaching the archway now, you can see where the metal is bent down and you three, notice immediately, as the light from the sword hits it, there is chiseled text into the metal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It reads, "Praesidis Ward, Convocation Grounds, Central Deliberations."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One more time, all the way through?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Central Deliberations? Doesn't that sound like it would be like a courtroom or something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, the Somnovem in the Cognouza Ward were, but we are in the Praesidis Ward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You push past the metallic archway and lead into the proceeding hall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I just do a perception check? Is it obvious that a path was burned away in this mold or is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, It's going to look like we're riding a lawnmower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So they're going to know that somebody came through here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does anybody have a a little fire that they could throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It certainly looks tampered with. I mean, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was going to try Sacred Flame, but that's actually--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, maybe bring some fire to bring it back to regrow the path.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can also cross that bridge if we decide to not put the intuit charge--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've already spoiled the ground, so there's no issue with futzing with it further.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so we're in the hallway?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, you were saying something and I cut you off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you can see four paths to traverse.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a quick investigation check to see if there's any path that looks like the main walkway? Or if one seems more derelict and collapsed?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll look, too, for the writing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you looking for tracks or anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What would feel like, in it's heyday, what would be the main corridor?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yasha, you said you found that robe on a body, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, it was on a skeleton that was--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It was half covered with-- it was in a collapsed building.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But the building is super collapsed now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you find another body, keep the skull, if you wouldn't mind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if this was-- What if there's multiple entrances from the tunnel, right? And this is the one that leads to the Praesidis Ward, but there's another doorway that we didn't see that leads to the Somnovem Ward. Wouldn't that'd be funny?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Like if it was that dangling door? Like there was-- It went to somewhere secret?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did we see any other doors in that main-- in the molded chamber?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It looked like an exterior courtyard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we're on the right path.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you do not see any viable texts or anything that catches your eye.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And everything is lit by Fjord's sword alone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you ask the Traveler maybe, or?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could spend a few minutes and ask the Traveler.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's take 10 minutes and we can do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll just sit down on the ground and try to contact Arty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're right on top of us, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you guys don't mind, can we wait for 10 minutes? I can just ask Arty to go take a look?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're asking him to take a look where?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In the courtyard, if there was another entrance we missed or anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was thinking which way to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or if he knew which way to go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, you got three questions, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And maybe if you have an extra question, you can see if Lucien and co. are close-ish?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah. I can see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's excellent because if we delay 20 or 30 minutes, I can take a short rest and regain a little bit of my--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need an hour for a short rest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, let's not short rest 'til we absolutely need to at this point--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We literally just took one today.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll sit down and set up a little Commune ritual.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's everyone else doing during the 10-minute period?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am keeping a very sharp eye on everything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to chat with Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So in that 10 minute period, what do you say?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, I'm just afraid the further down we go, the more we will blow our cover that we are here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know what would compare, but--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sure there's many cons that we're not thinking about, but--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They were very confident the last time we met.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the only thing that I can't-- That I'm trying to think of now with this situation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you mean, rip cord?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A "get out of Dodge" for us, if they do start overtaking us and it all backfires.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where does that go in your mind? We leave and what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess it's a question of, if Lucien starts chasing us, or if we start chasing Lucien.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's good to continue discovering all the paths ahead of us so we have options.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've definitely had the tables turned on us before, but for the moment, we're at least between him and what he wants.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I don't think for you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know. They look to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're doing your ritual where? Like, in the middle of the hall?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, make it look pretty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trying to keep an eye on, just keeping, somebody's got to keep a watch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you glancing down the two tunnels to look?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I mean we're there, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't traversed it at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No ones actually even looked down one hallway or the other.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We haven't looked down the hall? We should look down the hall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see similar signs of collapse, but you cannot see where they go beyond a few feet due to the lack of light source.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You turn around and see Jester working on her ritual and they're having the conversation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of the open collapsed holes and broken parts of this metallic hallway, you see something reach out and clamber--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got a problem, get ready.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How long has it been into Jester's ritual?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been maybe six, seven minutes or so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I shake her out of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go behind, there's no door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, so I'm assuming that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You walk up and look both ways, turn back, and there's something emerging on the opposite side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, like from the courtyard side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the courtyard side, from the ceiling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Multiple limbs, clanging onto the metallic ground and you hear (guttural breathing).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, hanging and then landing onto the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we'll pick up next week.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we just leave it for them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we control it? Who can control monsters?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whoever goes first, fights the things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything in the ruins that've taken up residence in the path that you're going.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Whoever's behind us is going to have an easy time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unless we can somehow charm this creature and tell it to hang out by the glyph.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you got the magic for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can't charm monsters the same way.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, we can't talk about this in front of Matt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it doesn't waste a spell slot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did not waste a spell slot.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't want to stop playing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, but if we go from here it could end up going pretty late.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll pick up for that next time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But on on the flip side, we get to [inaudible].

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: ♪ Time to fire up ♪ ♪ the text thread. ♪

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We love you very much and is it Thursday yet? (cheering) Good night.
